Pre-Game Insights: Gareth Southgate explained his decision to omit Jack Grealish from the England squad for Euro 2024, citing the stronger performances of other players in the squad.
Southgate mentioned that all players took the news respectfully and acknowledged their self-belief and mindset.
Southgate highlighted that the attacking areas of the squad are blessed with a lot of options, and the decision to leave out Grealish and Maddison was tough but necessary.
